subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 152225
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
325 PM PDT SUN APR 15 2007

CAZ040-041-160430-
/O.CON.KLOX.CF.S.0005.000000T0000Z-070416T1700Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
325 PM PDT SUN APR 15 2007

..HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF OVER LOS ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTY
BEACHES...

STRONG AND WIDESPREAD WEST TO NORTHWEST FLOW WILL CONTINUE TO
IMPACT THE COASTAL WATERS OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA...WHICH WILL
GENERATE A MODERATE TO LARGE SHORT PERIOD WIND SWELL. THIS WIND
SWELL WILL BUILD THROUGH THIS EVENING...THEN SUBSIDE THROUGH
MONDAY MORNING. AS A RESULT...SHORT PERIOD CHOPPY SURF BETWEEN 3
TO 6 FT WILL CONTINUE ALONG THE WINDIEST AND MOST EXPOSED WEST
FACING BEACHES OF LOS ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTY THROUGH EARLY
MONDAY MORNING.

STRONG RIP CURRENTS WILL ALSO IMPACT THE AREA THROUGH MONDAY...
WHICH WILL MAKE SWIMMING OR SURFING IN THESE HIGHER THAN NORMAL
WAVES VERY DANGEROUS FOR ANYONE. IF IN DOUBT...JUST STAY OUT.

$$

KITTELL
